task_description: Facing the building to your North (approx. 14°), estimate the height of the main building in front of you in meters. Answer with one number and a short rationale.

reason: I need to see the building’s roofline to estimate full height, so I will tilt the camera upward while keeping the current heading toward the building.
The camera is pitched up and the building’s top should be visible, so I will provide a height estimate based on apparent number of stories and typical floor-to-floor height.
